description: The Glossy Abelia is an amazing ornamental shrub, ideal for adding beauty and structure to your garden. With glossy, deep-green oval leaves, it is fast-growing and has showy, fragrant flowers in shades of pink from late spring to mid-summer. Its tough, durable and drought tolerant evergreen foliage provides a colourful backdrop for beds and borders all year round. The blooms also attract bees and other beneficial pollinators. Growing between 3-6 feet tall and wide, it makes an ideal low-maintenance addition to any landscape. This easy-care and versatile shrub also makes a stunning addition to containers and a beautiful border or hedge.
